field.name: openNewWindow
field.label: Open New Window
field.description: Open a new window when the link is clicked.

field.name: text
field.label: Link Text
field.description: Use this parameter to specify the link text. If left empty, the full URL will be displayed as the link's text. If you specify an image below, this will be used for its ALT attribute.

field.name: title
field.label: Link Title
field.description: This will be added to your link as Title attribute. Use this to provide additional information about your link. Most browsers display title text as a tooltip when it is hovered over.

field.name: image
field.label: Link Image
field.description: Enter the URL of an image. This will be used for the weblink instead of the weblink URL. You can use {live_site} as the replacement for your site's base URL. ie: {live_site}/images/banners/white.png

field.name: maxUrlLength
field.label: Max. URL Length
field.description: Enter the maximum URL's length before it is clipped

field.name: useInternalRedirect
field.label: Use internal redirect
field.description: Using internal redirect will hide the actual destination URL and use an internal URL to redirect users to the actual URL. This also allows you to track the number of visits the link gets. The number of visits can be shown in front-end when 'Show Counter' option below is set to Yes.

field.name: showCounter
field.label: Show counter
field.description: Shows the number of visits the link has been clicked in front-end. Tracking the number of visits is only available when you use internal redirect.

field.name: showGo
field.label: Show Go button
field.description: This Go button will be available in the back-end Edit Listing page to allow admin a fast way to open the listing's website.

field.name: acceptFTP
field.label: Accept FTP links
field.description: Setting this to Yes will enable this custom field to accept links with ftp:// protocol.

field.name: accessLevel
field.label: Access Level
field.description: Set the required access level in order for your users to view this link.

field.name: txtLogin
field.label: Login Message
field.description: If you've set the field's Access Level to Registered, this message will be shows when unregistered users view the field.

field.name: useNofollow
field.label: Use nofollow attribute
field.description: nofollow is an HTML attribute value used to instruct some search engines that a hyperlink should not influence the link target's ranking in the search engine's index. Enabling this parameter will append the nofollow attribute to all links created using this field type.

field.name: useGA
field.label: Use GA tracking
field.description: If you site uses Google Analytics, this allows you to track outbound link through this field. Please make sure you have Google Analytics running on your site and have the latest version of the tracking code before using this.

field.name: gaPageTrackDirectory
field.label: GA's outbound directory
field.description: If you use Google Analytics, this parameter allow you to enter an outgoing directory where all outbound clicks through this field will be recorded. More information: http://www.google.com/support/analytics/bin/answer.py?answer=55527&cbid=1aul57ykjrzdd&src=cb
